searchDataList.heading: About us
searchDataList.description: Incorporated in 1936, ACC, is one of the leading players in the Indian building materials market with a pan-India presence. For over eight decades, ACC has been synonymous with cement in India and set new benchmarks in research and innovative product development and introduced industry-leading brands.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Cement Range
searchDataList.description: With a legacy of innovation, ACC strives to bring you the best in construction materials. Explore our revolutionary range of cement to build your long-lasting home.

searchDataList.heading: ACC F2R Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC F2R Cement? ACC F2R cement - Foundation to Roof is a type of cutting - edge cement with superfine quality and superfast setting formula that helps you build your dream home faster.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Gold Water Shield Cement at Best Price | ACC Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Gold Water Shield Cemet? ACC GOLD WATER SHIELD Cement is India's first water - repelling cement with a unique water - resistant formula to protect your home from water leakage.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Dealership Advantages
searchDataList.description: ACC Dealership Advantages

searchDataList.heading: Why Join?
searchDataList.description: Join India's first cement company as a prestigious Channel Partner.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Suraksha Power Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Suraksha Power Cement? ACC Suraksha Power cement is loaded with unique strength multipliers that keep increasing the strength of your home and makes it long - lasting.

searchDataList.heading: ACC HPC Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC HPC Cement? ACC HPC long life - High Performance Cement is engineered blended cement made form superior quality clinker to achieve higher strength and durability.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Suraksha Power Plus Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Suraksha Power Cement? ACC Suraksha Power cement is loaded with unique strength multipliers that keep increasing the strength of your home and makes it long - lasting.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Concrete Plus Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Concrete Plus Cement? ACC Concret Plus Xtra Strong cement is made from high-quality clinker along with special performance additives to provide higher strength to your home.

searchDataList.heading: Home Builder
searchDataList.description: ACC Knowledge Series

searchDataList.heading: Before construction
searchDataList.description: Once you have a piece of land and you are ready to build your dream home, you need to get building plans and permissions, appoint a good contractor and choose right-quality materials before you actually start building a dream home.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Super Shaktimaan Cement
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Super Shaktimaan Cement? ACC Super Shaktimaan Cement is scientifically designed as fast setting cement with unique bonding properties, making your dream home stronger from the inside.

searchDataList.heading: Choosing the right quality materials
searchDataList.description: Now that you have a plan, permission and a contractor who is ready to begin construction, you must select the right quality of basic building materials, such as cement, steel, bricks, sand and aggregates.

searchDataList.heading: Cement Bags Storage
searchDataList.description: Ensure that the cement bags received at the construction site are stored in a dry location and are completely covered with plastic sheeting, including the bottom. Check the cement bags for manufacturing batch information and best before dates, and use them accordingly.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Green Bricks
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Green Bricks? India's first high strength eco friendly cement bricks , which protects your home from seepage and efflorescence for a beautiful exterior finish.

searchDataList.heading: ACC LeakBlock Cement Mix LB-202
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC LeakBlock Cement Mix LB-202? Cement mix which is an integral waterproofing compound for concrete and plaster with advance polymer technology.

searchDataList.heading: ACC LeakBlock Cement Mix LB-303
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC LeakBlock Cement Mix LB-303? An advanced acrylic emulsion based bonding compound for roof and wall waterproofing.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Xtra Strong Tile Adhesive - XT 222
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Xtra Strong Tile Adhesive - XT 222? A ready to use grey cement based tile adhesive used for fixing medium size ceramic, mosaic and vitrified tiles.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Xtra Strong Tile Adhesive - XT 333
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Xtra Strong Tile Adhesive - XT 333? A ready to use grey cement based tile adhesive used for fixing large format size ceramic, mosaic & vitrified tiles, granites, marbles, stones.

searchDataList.heading: ACC Xtra Premium White Adhesive - XT 444
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC Xtra Premium White Adhesive - XT 444? A Polymer modified white cement based, wall and floor adhesive designed to fix marbles, stones & tiles with long-lasting strength.

searchDataList.heading: ACC LeakBlock Waterproof Plaster - LB 101
searchDataList.description: Why Choose ACC LeakBlock Waterproof Plaster - LB 101? A ready-to-use cementitious waterproof mortar designed to meet all your internal and external plastering work needs.
